original_text: And ye shall do as I have done: ye shall not cover your lips, nor eat the bread of men.
korean_text: 너희가 에스겔이 행한 바와 같이 행하여 입술을 가리지 아니하며 사람의 음식물을 먹지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: And ye shall do as I have done:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 내가 행한 것 같이 행할지니라:

sentences.original_text: ye shall not cover your lips,
nor eat the bread of men.
